snippet: The United Nations secretary general said on Wednesday that North Korea had suddenly withdrawn its approval for him to enter the isolated country to visit an industrial park that South Korea jointly operates with the North.
abstract: United Nations Sec Gen Ban Ki-moon says North Korea has suddenly withdrawn its approval for him to enter country to visit an industrial park that South Korea jointly operates with the North.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations secretary general said on Wednesday that North Korea had suddenly withdrawn its approval for him to enter the isolated country to visit an industrial park that South Korea jointly operates with the North.

headline.main: North Korea: Ban Ki-moon Visit Suddenly Canceled by Pyongyang
headline.print_headline: Asia; North Korea: Ban Ki-moon Visit Suddenly Canceled by Pyongyang
